html.p: At low tide there are wide sand flats which warm the water when the tide comes back in. Spectacular sand dune system backs the beach area. There are change facilities and picnic tables.

dl.dd: #28 Sand Hills Beach Park Rd., Villagedale
Villagedale, 6 km south of Hwy 103, Exit 29. (Barrington), features a 2.5 km white sand beach.
